original_title: Στον ουρανό του τίποτα με ελάχιστα
overview: There were moments when I closed the door and my mind was flooded with questions. One of them was strong enough to turn on the camera. Do they love each other? Nota and Ilias are an elderly couple living in different worlds. The only common thing in these worlds is the slow and difficult decaying of the mind and body.
title: In the Sky of Nothingness with the Least
